sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Get the list of all issue types in a required Jira project.

Note:Flow designers must ensure that this action is always used in conjunction with relevant actions that use dynamic inputs.

Inputs:

  • Connection Alias - Sys ID of the Connection Alias Record you wish to use in the action.
  • Project Key -Key of the required Jira project.

Outputs:

  • Issue Types - JSON object containing name and ID of the issue types.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Jira, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • The Jira instance is unreachable or down as the request timed out.
  • Invalid Project Key.
  • Either the URL to the Jira Cloud instance is incorrect or the server is unreachable or down.

To use this action, the corresponding Jira connection and credential must be created and associated with the Jira Connection & Credential alias.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More

106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7sys_hub_step_instancechris.crockett2021-04-05 23:16:3797cc19de1b1368108b08419ead4bcb4e4984874091bdfa8508b08419ead4bcb3fchris.crockett2021-04-05 23:31:04sys_hub_step_instance97cc19de1b1368108b08419ead4bcb4e400sys_variable_valuechris.crockett2021-04-05 23:16:372fcc19de1b1368108b08419ead4bcb7c0chris.crockett2021-04-05 23:16:3735aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4sys_hub_step_instance97cc19de1b1368108b08419ead4bcb4e600sys_variable_valuechris.crockett2021-04-05 23:16:37e3cc19de1b1368108b08419ead4bcb7d3chris.crockett2021-04-05 23:31:04(function execute(inputs, outputs) { // Stolen from the Jira Spoke JiraUtils Script Include // For some reason, they made it inaccessible from other scopes // They also marked it Read-Only, so we can't manually change the access... function getAPIVersion(sys_alias) { var gr = new GlideRecord('connection_attributes'); gr.initialize(); gr.addQuery('model', sys_alias); gr.query(); while (gr.next()) { if (gr.column_label.toString().toLowerCase() == 'api version') // so that capitalization will not be a problem return gr.default_value; } return 2; } if (inputs.project.trim() == "") throw new Error("Project cannot be empty"); outputs.connection_alias_sys_id = inputs.sys_alias.sys_id; outputs.api_version = getAPIVersion(outputs.connection_alias_sys_id); })(inputs, outputs);71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719bapplication97cc19de1b1368108b08419ead4bcb4echris.crockett2021-04-05 23:16:37e3cc19de1b1368108b08419ead4bcb7c0chris.crockett2021-04-05 23:16:37var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7
